ValidationRule.description: When Outcome is selected as "Verified", Approval Log should be selected otherwise error will be thrown.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Process__c , 'Validate Email Approval Response') &&OR(ISPICKVAL( Outcome__c , 'Verified and Request Approved'),ISPICKVAL( Outcome__c , 'Verified and Request Not Approved'))&& ISBLANK(Approval_Log__c ) ,True,False)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide appropriate Approval Log for Approval/Rejection.
